questions.question: What does it mean <!DOCTYPE html> at the start of the HTML file ?

answers.answer: File is written in  XHTML 1.1 version
File is written in XHTML 1.0 Strict version
File  is written in  HTML 4.01 version
File is written in HTML5 version

questions.question: Using Emmet the following ul>li*8 will add ?

answers.answer: 1 <ul> element with 8 <li> elements with values from 1 to 8
